website_summaries.verdict: The Under Armour lifestyle collection balances innovation and style yet again with the HOVR SLK. It’s been praised by most reviewers for its subtle and clean style. Many commend it for offering comfort right out of the box.Praises are also given for its lightweight and breathable structure, along with its excellent cushioning. For the fit, the sneaker is described to be true to size. However, it’s been found to run narrow by some users. At its reasonable price, this shoe should be worthy of the attention of sneaker lovers.
pros: The Under Armour HOVR SLK has a great look, with a low-profile and neat appeal, the majority of reviewers agree
According to most purchasers, the shoe is very comfortable right out of the box
Although there are only a few colorways for this sneaker, wearers like their subtle look
Several commenters laud the Under Armour HOVR SLK for being lightweight
A couple of commenters add that this is a great all-around shoe from the Under Armour sneaker line
The sneaker is offered at an affordable price
There’s excellent cushioning in the Under Armour HOVR SLK, more than a handful of users have revealed
Some purchasers share that the sneaker slips on easily in addition to the lace-up closure
More than a few buyers commend the shoe for being breathable, keeping the foot cool and dry
The model fits true to size, many wearers have discovered
cons: The Under Armour HOVR SLK runs narrow, several reviewers have detected

customer_reviews.title: Pretty in person
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is gorgeous! Pic doesn't do it justice. Bought for my son for Christmas December 2018. He has a wide foot so I buy 1/2 size larger when wide is not available. We were a Nike family but I am now boycotting Nike and we are officially an Under Armour fan. Our college team also wears Under Armour. My son loved the look of the shoe. He never knew how nice Under Armour is till now.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Look good but too tight around the toe
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of these shoes. That being said I was pretty bummed when I tried them on. They were super tight around the toe area and a little narrow through the whole shoe. They looked good when I put them on though. Everyone has a different shaped foot so maybe they will fit you better. As for the look of the shoe, they look good. Wish they would have worked for me
customer_reviews.author: K&J's Dad

customer_reviews.title: I will take this shoe in every color
customer_reviews.text: These are really comfortable. Especially being one year post partum, my feet size has not gone back down. I went with 11 men and glad I did because if I did the 10 1/2 my toes would be right at the front. So the fit is pretty good, I have about 1/2-3/4” from my toes touching the front. They slip on really easily. I had trouble with another brand shoe where the opening of the shoe only opened so far and it was just a b***** to put on. These go on nice. The black on black looks awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Available as both men's and women'
customer_reviews.text: Tight fit and discovered that this exact shoe color and style is also offered and available for both men and women. When I showed them to my adult children they asked if I was coming out of the closet. I will be returning the shoes for another style and size.
customer_reviews.author: woakley

customer_reviews.title: There extremely durable, definitely not worth $90+
customer_reviews.text: To be honest. I couldn't afford these. So I returned em. Amazon Wardrobe gave me the opportunity to touch them and send em back haha. These shoes are amazing and feel nice and look nice. If you buy em, you'll love em.
customer_reviews.author: Donasheed

customer_reviews.title: Best walking shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these sneakers for a trip abroad. I packed three pair and of shoes and ended up just wearing these. Life savers. Walked 75miles in them and didn’t get a single blister and my feet never hurt. If I could give them 10 stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Reesah23

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am an Under Armor fan! I love these shoes. I have heel and arch problems, but these shoes make running much more comfortable. This is more than I usually spend on running shoes, but you get what you pay for and these are definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Eksyrg

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking, Comfortable Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe fits slightly small, I usually wear a 13, occasionally a 14 but this shoe was definitely a better fit in a 14. These are light, breathable and a great everyday or gym shoe. Wouldn't recommend for running or any overly-strenuous activities. My girlfriend also has a pair and she loves them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. Great work walking and running or just everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Austin F

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 7.5 and figured they would fit, this shoes is about a size larger so I would go about a size smaller. I thought the original shoes was all black and they are a dark grey.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: It has taken me some time to find a good shoe for my son that doesn’t hurt his feet or fall apart. We are having good luck with Under Armor. He really likes the fit and look of this shoe. I’m very happy with how they hold up. This is our second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Narrow and not as comfortable as I expected
customer_reviews.text: At that price I expected a good product, but there are some pink edges, almost all around the shoe, maybe it is glue. They have arch support but they don't have the softness I thought. They are very narrow, if you have a wide foot I suggest not buying it
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Palma

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love them! I was a bit worried but I’m a size 12 and they fit just right! They are very light and very comfortable! And they look great jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Ankle Chafing
customer_reviews.text: Overall the shoe feels very solid except for one major flaw... the shoe kept chafing the back of my ankle even after a few workouts to try and break in the shoe. This rendered the shoe unusable for me as I typically wear ankle socks and there was noticeable discomfort with every step.
customer_reviews.author: Sachin Weerasooriya

customer_reviews.title: UnderArmour is BEST
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear 10 1/2 in UA. Could have probably got a 10 in these. But they ate fantastic!!
customer_reviews.author: FastFreddyFromFrisco

customer_reviews.title: No tongue takes getting used to.
customer_reviews.text: I found the tongueless/slipper design very difficult to put on. They're not worth the hassle for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Style
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is very stylish and looks good. A little snug to the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Gaskin

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Wear it for a few months already. Light, comfy, snazzy and not too much.
customer_reviews.author: Layday

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and feels good!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable! Also pretty good for some light running. Not to mention I think they look good as casual sneakers as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: That the bottoms won't last long at all
customer_reviews.text: 2 weeks of wearing these and the bottoms whore out! Zero grip left on these shoes Garbage
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Try them. They don’t disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: I like that they’re light and comfortable. I work ten hours a day and my feet no longer hurt when I’m done for the day! They’re like walking on padded carpet! They’re great!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy the soles collect a lot of dirt but have great traction
customer_reviews.author: Andrew gudgel

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe i wear a 10 so I ordered a 10 and it fit perfect. Feels like a sock like material only complaint I have is they stain because of the fabric
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Baca

customer_reviews.title: Shoe wore out in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of the shoe is completely flat. back of the shoe where the foot goes in is so damaged it hurts my heal. I've been wearing these less than 1 month.
customer_reviews.author: justin tallent

customer_reviews.title: Used product
customer_reviews.text: Item was received slightly used. Dirt and mud between the soles very visible. This must've been a returned item. No one even bothered to inspect the product and make sure it was clean. Returning item
customer_reviews.author: Allan Michael Caloza

customer_reviews.title: Incredible shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes I have wide feet an these are actually roomy!
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Shoes provide no support and the heal is already tearing. Never buying under armor shoes again.
customer_reviews.author: Abel Jauregui

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Really good and comfortable shoe. Fits as expected, BUT the toe section is a little longer than average.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Dishman

customer_reviews.title: Pimpen!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome, will buy myself another pair soon.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey D

customer_reviews.title: Fits true to size and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are light and comfortable, just don’t wear them out into rain cause they soak very fast!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’d say order half size bigger than normal and you should be ok
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy just fits a little snug and kind pretty narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Love them just gets dirty super easy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes super confortable but color gets dirty super wuick
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Orozco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoe,"Sharp, I collect shoes, think it is my only weakness, nice addition to my collection..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's HOVR SLK Trainers
product_meta.description: Lightweight mesh upper provides breathability with style. Firm heel support for extra support that holds the back of the foot firmly in place. Air mesh tongue construction for improved ventilation. Soft, die-cut insole provides extra cushioning. The UA HOVR technology provides a "Zero Gravity feel" to maintain the energy return, which helps to eliminate shocks step by step. High abrasion resistant rubber outsole with studded structure for ultimate durability. Removable insole weight: 8.48 oz.
feature_bullets: The lightweight mesh upper ensures excellent breathability without sacrificing style
Solid external buttress for greater support and stability of the back of the foot
Air Mesh tongue structure for greater ventilation
The soft punched midsole ensures cushioning and support at the sole of the foot
Under Armour HOVR technology provides a "gravity-free" feeling that favours the return of energy, reducing the impact on the ground
